name: Gmail - fix format of various digests
description:
For some reason, email digests seem to have more issues with nice styling.  My biggest complaint is about unncessary whitespace.

This will be an accumulation of fixes for digests that I come across.  Feel free to suggest others.  Nothing to do with Gmail, except for the selectors

* Update for Google Group Digests
additional_info:
Only tested with Chrome and Firefox.

Changes for:

Google Groups Digest
Google Blog/Reader Digest (not sure what this is called)
OpEdNews
Common Dreams
AlterNet
Discus Discussion Digest.
Wordpress
Quora
Constant Contact
Salsa (many variations here)
SingularityHub
Kurzweil
Truthout
gizmag
